name: Loaded Gear - Fun Car Racing Games for Kids
name_original: Loaded Gear - Fun Car Racing Games for Kids
description:
OK, the goal is to get to the finish line in style; get there as fast as you can, performing crazy stunts along the way.Your opponents will try to push you out of the track or push off track.

The cooler they look, the better! Don’t fall off! Keep your balance, or it’s game over.

Ready for some high-flying adrenaline-pumping action? Oh, Yeah!
